channel.title: Getting this code to work
channel.description:
Hello, what I want this to do is get the value of each item in the players inventory, if I have the code like this,
[code]int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems));[/code]
I get this error,
[code]client.java:101: GetItemValue(int) in client cannot be applied to (int[]) int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));
^ client.java:101: operator + cannot be applied to double,GetItemValue int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));
^
client.java:101: floor(double) in java.lang.Math cannot be applied to (<nulltype >) int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));[/code]
How could I fix/get it to work?

item.title: Getting this code to work
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Hello, what I want this to do is get the value of each item in the players inventory, if I have the code like this,

int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems));

I get this error,

[code]client.java:101: GetItemValue(int) in client cannot be applied to (int[])
int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS
hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm
ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla
yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem
Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));

                                           ^

client.java:101: operator + cannot be applied to double,GetItemValue
int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS
hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm
ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla
yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem
Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));

                                                                           ^

client.java:101: floor(double) in java.lang.Math cannot be applied to (<nulltype

)
int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerCape]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerS
hield]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerChest]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipm
ent[playerAmulet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHat]) + GetItemValue(pla
yerEquipment[playerLegs]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerHands]) + GetItem
Value(playerEquipment[playerFeet]) + GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerRing]) +
GetItemValue(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + GetItemValue(playerItems));[/code]

How could I fix/get it to work?
